channel.title: DedSec Blog
channel.description: Termux guides, troubleshooting, privacy, and Python learning — by DedSec Project.

item.title: DedSec Blog — Learn Python Using Termux: Getting Started
item.description: Install Python, create projects, and build a daily learning routine on Android.

item.title: DedSec Blog — Mass Surveillance Through Technology & Digital ID
item.description: How modern tracking works, where digital ID fits in, and practical privacy steps.

item.title: DedSec Blog — Termux Errors and How to Solve Them
item.description: Common errors explained with quick fixes and commands.

item.title: DedSec Blog — Termux: All a New User Needs to Know
item.description: A practical starter guide: setup, packages, storage, and good habits.

item.title: DedSec Blog — Run Distros & OSes in Termux Using Only Your Phone
item.description: Use proot-distro to run Debian/Ubuntu/Alpine safely without root.

item.title: DedSec Blog — Watch Dogs vs Real Life (2026): What’s Accurate, What’s Not
item.description: A grounded comparison between the games’ ctOS fantasy and the real-world tech landscape of 2026.
